fields.label: Database/Dataset/System Name (English)
fields.description: The official English name of the database, dataset, or system.

fields.label: Acronym (English)
fields.description: The commonly used acronym for the dataset.

fields.label: Description (English)
fields.description: A detailed description of the dataset's content, purpose, and scope.
fields.example: This dataset contains health-related survey data collected from citizens across the country to monitor public health trends.

fields.label: Objective(s) (English)
fields.description: The main goals or purposes for collecting the dataset.
fields.example: To assess the health status and needs of the population for policy development and resource allocation.

fields.label: Geographical Coverage
fields.description: The geographic area the dataset covers.
fields.example: National; includes all provinces and territories.

fields.label: Data Quality Checks or Assessments
fields.description: Methods used to ensure data quality and integrity.
fields.example: Data undergoes quarterly validation and annual external audits.

fields.label: Frequency of Data Collection
fields.description: How often the data is collected.

fields.label: Data Sources
fields.description: Original sources from which the data is obtained.

fields.label: Open Government Status
fields.description: Indicates the dataset's availability under Open Government policies.

fields.label: Programming Language
fields.description: Programming languages used in processing or analyzing the dataset.

fields.label: Years/Cycle Available
fields.description: The years or cycles for which data is available.

fields.label: Availability of Indigenous Variables/Data
fields.description: Indicates if the dataset includes data specific to Indigenous populations.

fields.label: Availability of Sex and Gender-based Analysis Plus (SGBA+) Data
fields.description: Indicates if the dataset includes SGBA+ variables.

fields.label: Data is Accessible to
fields.description: The groups or individuals who can access the data.

fields.label: Intended Audience of Data Knowledge Translation Products and Publications
fields.description: Target audience for any publications or products derived from the dataset.

fields.label: When was the Open Government Portal last updated?
fields.description: The date when the dataset was last updated on the Open Government Portal.

fields.label: Hyperlinks
fields.description: Relevant links to the dataset, documentation, or related resources.
